field.name: summary
field.value: The use of RemotingConfiguration.RegisterXXXType should be configurable

field.name: description
field.value:
In Castle.Facilities.Remoting.RemotingInspector, the ConfigureClientComponent issues a RemotingConfiguration.RegisterXXXType for every component. This behaviour should be configurable through an component attribute, as it will throw an error when 2 different components try to implement the same service.
Right now, I'm working around it by specifying remoteClient="none"
